text: These are the official results of the Men's 4x400 metres event at the 1993 IAAF World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany. There were a total number of eighteen participating nations, with three qualifying heats and the final held on Sunday 1993-08-22. ==Final== {| class="wikitable" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" !RANK !style="width: 12em"|NATION !style="width: 18em"|ATHLETES !style="width: 5em"|TIME |- |align="center"|Image:Med 1.png |align="center"| |• Andrew Valmon • Quincy Watts • Butch Reynolds • Michael Johnson |align="center"|2:54.29 World Record Championships Record |- |align="center"|Image:Med 2.png |align="center"| |• Kennedy Ochieng • Simon Kemboi • Abednego Matilu • Samson Kitur |align="center"|2:59.82 |- |align="center"|Image:Med 3.png |align="center"| |• Rico Lieder • Karsten Just • Olaf Hense • Thomas Schönlebe |align="center"|2:59.99 |- |align="center"|4. |align="center"| |• Jean-Louis Rapnouil • Pierre-Marie Hilaire • Jacques Farraudière • Stéphane Diagana |align="center"|3:00.09 |- |align="center"|5. |align="center"| |• Dmitriy Kliger • Dmitriy Kosov • Mikhail Vdovin • Dmitriy Golovastov |align="center"|3:00.44 |- |align="center"|6. |align="center"| |• Iván García • Héctor Herrera • Norberto Téllez • Roberto Hernández |align="center"|3:00.46 |- |align="center"|7. |align="center"| |• Patrick O'Connor • Dennis Blake • Danny McFarlane • Greg Haughton |align="center"|3:01.44 |- |align="center"|8. |align="center"| |• Stanislav Georgiev • Tsvetoslav Stankulov • Kiril Raykov • Anton Ivanov |align="center"|3:05.35 |} ==Qualifying heats== *Held on Saturday 1993-08-21 ===Heat 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="border-collapse: collapse;
